element.panel_attributes:
/Header {abstract}/ -- label : str column_descriptors : list of DimensionDescription
is_measure : Booleen is_categorical_with_values : Booleen is_undifferentiated : Booleen
-- (abstract methods) n_elem() is_categorical() get_n_columns() get_units() get_all_units()
get_value(line, column = None) get_item_name(nline)

MeasureHeader -- label : str column_descriptors : list of 1 DimensionDescription
start : float scale : float n_elem : int
is_categorical :Booleen -- MeasureHeader(label, start, n_elem, scale, unit = None, checkbank = None, column_descriptors = None) -- <<update>> update_measureheader(start = None, n_elem = None, scale = None)

CategoricalHeader -- label : str column_descriptors : list of DimensionDescription
values : pandas DataFrame
n_elem : int is_categorical : Booleen -- CategoricalHeader(label, column_descriptors = None, n_elem = None, values = None) -- <<update>> update_categoricalheader(flag, ind, value) merge_lines(ind) add_column(column_descriptor, values)
